abstract: Canpotex, which is owned by three Canadian potash producers, negotiates long-term, often secret, pricing agreements with offshore customers.
snippet: Canpotex, which is owned by three Canadian potash producers, negotiates long-term, often secret, pricing agreements with offshore customers.
lead_paragraph: It is hardly a household word like, say, the oil cartel OPEC. That is why Canpotex, an organization with a corner on Canada’s potash production, used to go about its business in nearly complete obscurity.

headline.main: Bid Puts Spotlight on Crucial Player in Potash
